trait.name: Two Heads
entries: The ettin has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: 当ETTIN的一个头在睡觉时，它的另一个头是醒着的。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 艾丁做了两次攻击：一次是用战斧，一次是用晨星。

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5})砍击伤害。

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: 艾丁的右头在30英尺的范围内喷出火焰。该区域内的每个生物都必须做一个{@dc 14}灵巧的蓄力动作，蓄力失败会受到45({@damage 10d8})的火焰伤害，蓄力成功则受到一半的伤害。

action.name: Cold Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: 艾丁的左头在30英尺的范围内呼出一股冰冷的气流。该区域内的每个生物都必须做一个{@dc 14}体质救赎，救赎失败会受到45({@damage 10d8})的寒冷伤害，救赎成功会受到一半的伤害。

action.name: Gaze
entries: 艾丁将它的魔法目光转向它能看到的120英尺内的一个生物。该目标必须做一个{@dc 14}智慧救赎动作。除非目标是{@condition incapacitated}，否则它可以移开视线以避开凝视，并自动救赎成功。如果目标这样做，它就不能看到Etin，直到Etin的下一个回合开始。如果目标在这期间看向Etin，它必须立即进行救赎。
如果目标没有救活，它将遭受ETTIN所选择的或随机的以下效果之一。

action.name: Beguiling Gaze
entries: 目标是{@condition stunned}，直到ettin的下一回合开始，或直到ettin不再处于视线范围内。

action.name: Hypnotic Gaze
entries: The target is {@condition charmed} by the ettin until the start of the ettin's next turn. The ettin chooses how the {@condition charmed} target uses its actions, reactions, and movement.

action.name: Insanity Gaze
entries: 目标遭受{@spell confusion}法术的影响，而不需要进行救赎。该效果会持续到Etin的下一个回合开始。ettin不需要专注于该法术。

items.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: 安德拉斯在依靠听觉或视觉的智慧检查中具有优势。

items.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})的穿刺伤害，目标必须在{@dc 11}宪法救赎中成功，否则会被狼人的狼性所诅咒。

items.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6}击中，范围80/320英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})穿刺伤害，目标必须在{@dc 11}体质测试中成功，否则会被狼人的狼性所诅咒。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Barbatos is a 6th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following ranger spells prepared:

trait.name: Rust Monster Cloak
entries: 任何由金属制成的非魔法武器，如果击中了巴尔巴托斯就会被腐蚀。在造成伤害后，该武器的伤害卷会受到永久的、累积的-1惩罚。如果它的惩罚下降到-5，武器就会被摧毁。由金属制成的非魔法弹药击中巴巴托斯，在造成伤害后会被摧毁。

trait.name: Heart of the Troll
entries: 巴尔巴托斯在他的回合开始时恢复10点生命值。如果巴尔巴托斯受到酸或火的伤害，这个特性在巴尔巴托斯的下一个回合开始时不会发挥作用。巴巴托斯只有在他的回合开始时命中率为0并且没有再生时才会死亡。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 巴尔巴托斯进行两次骨质短剑攻击。

action.name: Bone Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also {@condition unconscious}. The target regains consciousness if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it.

action.name: Cloak Sweep
entries: 巴尔巴托斯腐蚀他能看到的5英尺内的非魔法黑色金属物体。如果该物体没有被穿戴或携带，触摸会破坏其1英尺的立方体。如果该物体是由生物佩戴或携带的，该生物可以做一个{@dc 12}灵巧反射来避免Barbatos的触摸。
如果被触及的物体是金属盔甲或正在穿戴或携带的金属盾牌，它将对其提供的AC值进行永久的、累积的1次惩罚。降到10级的盔甲或降到0级的盾牌会被摧毁。如果被触及的物体是持有的金属武器，它就会生锈，就像Barbatos的锈怪斗篷特性中描述的那样。

action.name: Pick or Hammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3}击中，到达5英尺，一个生物。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1})重击或穿刺伤害。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The medusa's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). The medusa can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Petrifying Gaze
entries: When a creature that can see the medusa's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of the medusa, the medusa can force it to make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw if the medusa isn't {@condition incapacitated} and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly {@condition petrified}. Otherwise, a creature that fails the save begins to turn to metal, wood, or porcelain (the medusa's choice) and is {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming {@condition petrified} on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by the  {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.
除非{@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}，生物可以转移视线以避免在其回合开始时进行蓄力。如果该生物这样做了，它就不能看到美杜莎，直到下一回合开始时，它可以再次移开眼睛。如果该生物在这期间看了美杜莎，它必须立即进行救赎。
如果冥王看到自己在30英尺范围内的抛光表面上反映出来，而且是在亮光区域，由于它的诅咒，冥王会被自己的凝视所影响。

items.name: Pacifying Spores (3/Day)
entries: 橡树爷爷向它周围5英尺内能看到的一个生物喷出孢子。目标必须在宪法规定的投掷中成功，否则将在1分钟内受到{@condition stunned}的影响。目标可以在它的每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果成功则结束对自己的影响。

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Lynx's crystal eye is a magically shrunken crystal ball of true seeing. One of her teeth is a refashioned ring of mind shielding, while another has been magicked to place her under a permanent {@spell Nystul's magic aura} spell, concealing the magic of these items and hiding her true nature from magic or features that can detect undead.

trait.name: Aversion of Fire
entries: 如果Lynx受到火的伤害，她在攻击卷和能力检查上有劣势，直到她下一回合结束。

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: 猞猁对任何会改变她形态的法术或效果都免疫。

trait.name: Lightning Absorption
entries: 每当猞猁受到雷电伤害时，她不会受到任何伤害，反而会恢复与所受雷电伤害相等的命中率。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 猞猁对法术和其他魔法效果的救赎有优势。

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: 猞猁在她的回合开始时恢复10点生命值。如果她受到火或辐射伤害，这个特性在她下一回合开始时不会发挥作用。猞猁的身体只有在她的回合开始时命中率为0并且没有再生时才会被摧毁。

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: 猞猁对变成亡灵的效果免疫。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 林克斯进行了两次短剑攻击。

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4})穿刺伤害。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Moghadam is an 18th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following artificer spells prepared:

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Moghadam wields {@item Ruinblade|IMR} (see appendix C).

trait.name: Artificial Mind
entries: 莫哈达姆可以将一个人造的思想表现为一个浮动的幽灵形象，即一个{@creature demilich}的珠宝头骨。莫哈达姆可以与这个思想进行心灵感应，将它送到离他300英尺远的地方，并通过它看和听。

trait.name: Infoportation (1/Day)
entries: 莫哈达姆可以将自己传送到他的人工头脑旁边的一个无人空间。

action.name: Ruinblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2})砍击伤害。

action.name: Blight (1/Day)
entries: 挥舞{@item Ruinblade|IMR}时，莫格达姆可以施展{@spell blight}的法术({@dc 15})。

action.name: Disintegrate (1/7 Days)
entries: 挥舞{@item Ruinblade|IMR}时，莫格达姆可以对任何非魔法物体或魔法力量的创造物施展{@spell disintegrate}的法术。

action.name: Information Overload {@recharge 5}
entries: 莫格达姆使自己或他的人工头脑5英尺范围内的一个生物的思想超载。目标必须在{@dc 16}智力救赎中成功，否则会受到22({@damage 4d8 + 4})的精神伤害，并且在莫格达姆下一回合结束前对目标进行的下一次攻击卷有优势。

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The neo-otyugh's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 12}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: Otyugh可以用魔法将简单的信息和图像传送给它周围120英尺内任何能理解语言的生物。这种形式的心灵感应并不允许接收的生物做出心灵感应。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 新龙虾有三种攻击方式：一种是咬人，两种是用触手。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw against disease or become {@condition poisoned} until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the target must repeat the saving throw, reducing its hit point maximum by 5 ({@dice 1d10}) on a failure. The disease is cured on a success. The target dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until the disease is cured.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达15英尺，一个目标。{@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5})重击伤害。如果目标是大型或小型，则是{@condition grappled}(逃跑{@dc 16})和{@condition restrained}，直到抓捕结束。新龙人有两个触手，每个触手可以抓取一个目标。

action.name: Tentacle Slam
entries: The neo-otyugh slams creatures {@condition grappled} by it into each other or a solid surface. Each creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or take 15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of the neo-otyugh's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.

items.name: Earth Walk
entries: Seodra can move across {@quickref difficult terrain||3} made of earth or stone without expending extra movement.

items.name: Treasure Sense
entries: Seodra can pinpoint, by scent, the location of precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 60 feet of her.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Ursas爵士戴着心灵屏蔽的戒指，穿着抗火的板甲。

trait.name: Brave
entries: Sir Ursas has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Brute
entries: 当Ursas爵士用一个近战武器击中时，该武器会造成一个额外的伤害（包括在他的攻击中）。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ursas爵士可进行三次近战攻击或两次远程攻击。

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})砍击伤害。

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7}命中，攻击距离5英尺，范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})穿刺伤害，如果用双手进行近战攻击，则为13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4})重击伤害，如果目标是中型或较小的生物，必须成功进行{@dc 15}力量投掷，否则会被击倒{@condition prone}。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Ursas爵士在对抗一次会击中他的近战攻击时，会在他的AC上加3。要做到这一点，他必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器。

_copy.name: Warlock of the Great Old One

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 2d6 + 1})砍击伤害。

items.name: Fist of Retribution
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d4 + 8})重击伤害加上7 ({@damage 2d6})火力伤害。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Thessalar is an 18th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following artificer spells prepared:

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Thessalar挥舞着涂有{@item +1 dagger}的{@item Thessaltoxin|IMR|thessaltoxin poison}(见附录C)。

trait.name: Alchemical Homunculus
entries: Thessalar is accompanied by his {@creature Thessalar's homunculus|IMR}. If the {@spell mending} spell is cast on it, the homunculus regains {@dice 2d6} hit points.

trait.name: Healing Toxicity
entries: 任何能恢复命中率并能应用于穿刺或切割武器的魔法物品（药水、药膏等），都会使用该武器击中后对塞萨尔造成额外的伤害，其伤害量相当于该物品通常能治疗的量。

trait.name: Greater Restoration (1/Day)
entries: Thessalar可以施展{@spell greater restoration}，如果他有机会获得{@item Alchemist's Supplies|phb|alchemical supplies}。

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 5}击中，距离5英尺或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1})穿刺伤害，目标必须成功进行{@dc 15}宪法救赎动作。如果救赎失败，目标会受到{@spell polymorph}法术的影响，变成一个随机的{@filter beast|bestiary|type=beast|miscellaneous=!swarm}或它在过去24小时内见过的生物（由DM选择）。这个效果会持续到目标完成一个长时间的休息。

items.name: Acidic Spittle
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4}击中，范围30英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})酸性伤害。

monster.name: Thessalheart Construct
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: 当构造物与它的主人处于同一存在平面时，它可以用魔法将它的感觉传达给它的主人，而且两者可以进行心灵感应。

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}1次砍击伤害，并且目标必须在{@dc 10}宪法救赎中成功，否则会被{@condition poisoned}1分钟。如果蓄力失败5次以上，目标会被{@condition poisoned}5({@dice 1d10})分钟和{@condition unconscious}，同时以这种方式{@condition poisoned}。

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: 萨尔克拉克人可以呼吸空气和水。

trait.name: Freedom of Movement
entries: The thessalkraken ignores {@quickref difficult terrain||3}, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be {@condition restrained}. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 蛇怪会进行一次咬人攻击和两次触手攻击。它可以用一次 "甩动 "来代替每次触手攻击。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) acid damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by the thessalkraken, that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the thessalkraken, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the thessalkraken's turns.

If the thessalkraken takes 35 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, it must succeed on a {@dc 23} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the thessalkraken. If the thessalkraken dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 10 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12}击中，到达20英尺，一个目标。{@h}17({@damage 3d6 + 7})砍伤，目标是{@condition grappled}(逃跑{@dc 16})。直到这个抓捕结束，目标是{@condition restrained}。Thessalkraken有十个触手，每个触手可以抓住一个目标。

action.name: Fling
entries: One Medium or smaller object held or creature {@condition grappled} by the thessalkraken is thrown up to 40 feet in a random direction and knocked {@condition prone}. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Acid Saliva {@recharge 5}
entries: 蛇怪向它周围60英尺内可以看到的地方吐出一球酸液。在该点10英尺范围内的每个生物必须做一个{@dc 18}灵巧的蓄力动作，蓄力失败会受到22({@damage 4d10})的酸液伤害，蓄力成功则受到一半的伤害。

legendary.name: Tentacle Attack
entries: 深海怪兽进行了一次触手攻击。

legendary.name: Fling
entries: Thessalkraken使用Fling。

legendary.name: Ink Cloud (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: 在水下时，深海怪兽会在60英尺的范围内释放出一片墨水云。墨云在角落里扩散，该区域对深海怪兽以外的生物来说是非常模糊的。每个在那里结束它的回合的生物，都必须成功地进行一次{@dc 18}宪法救赎，如果救赎失败，将受到16({@damage 3d10})的毒药伤害，如果救赎成功，将受到一半的伤害。强劲的水流会驱散云层，否则云层会在深海怪兽的下一回合结束时消失。

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: 双头鳄鱼可以憋气15分钟。

trait.name: Two Heads
entries: The two-headed crocodile has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: 当鳄鱼的一个头在睡觉时，它的另一个头是清醒的。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 双头鳄鱼用它的咬力进行两次攻击。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2})穿刺伤害，目标为{@condition grappled}(逃脱{@dc 12})。直到这个抓捕结束，目标是{@condition restrained}，鳄鱼的那个头不能咬到其他目标。

trait.name: Two Heads
entries: The two-headed owlbear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: 当猫头鹰的一个头在睡觉时，它的另一个头是醒着的。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 双头猫头鹰熊会进行三次攻击：两次用喙，一次用爪子。

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5})砍击伤害。
